entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
